data.message:
Your algorithm or bots keep telling me that my postings are "spam" and I feel like you are unfairly labeling legitimate and nice postings by me and all f my content as SPAM as a pretext to censor me and limit my access to freedom of expression and free speech, and you seem to be selectively enforcing some rule which I have never broken.  I am a nice and good person, and I do not like your doing this to me, for I have no recourse to your bot, or to you algorithms.  Then I always get this piece of  BOILER PLATE:  "You’re Temporarily Blocked
It looks like you were misusing this feature by going too fast. You’ve been blocked from using it.

Learn more about blocks in the Help Center.
If you think you're seeing this by mistake, please let us know."

replies.message: Hi Kim-Ha. It sounds like you may have overused a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Please sit tight while the ban is in place. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2xOpk1z. If you think you may have been blocked by mistake, you can file an appeal here: http://bit.ly/2zdp67T. -Kiara
so,facebooks answer was it was Kim-Ha's FAULT.. they deactivated mine also... it's always OUR fault. .fb does not own up to problem with fb.

We can't lift this block for any reason ... is their answer. I have been blocked over 27 times since August 2017 because I share posts of animals about o be killed. They say I am misusing their feature ... but yet they allow violence and graphic videos on their site. I am tired of being blocked non stop as if I am on an "Automatic Block" due to some robot that is stuck in the wrong mode!
